Object.Field:
create table SNP_EXP_TXT (
FIRST_DATE DATETIME NULL ,
FIRST_USER VARCHAR(400) NULL ,
IND_CHANGE VARCHAR(1) NULL ,
INT_VERSION DECIMAL(10) NULL ,
I_TXT DECIMAL(19) NOT NULL ,
LAST_DATE DATETIME NULL ,
LAST_USER VARCHAR(400) NULL ,
TXT VARCHAR(250) NULL ,
TXT_ORD DECIMAL(10) NOT NULL
) ENGINE = InnoDB ROW_FORMAT = DYNAMIC

create table SNP_EXP_TXT_HEADER (
I_TXT DECIMAL(19) NOT NULL ,
FULL_TXT LONGTEXT NULL
) ENGINE = InnoDB ROW_FORMAT = DYNAMIC

create table SNP_FF_VALUEE (
FF_CODE VARCHAR(35) NOT NULL ,
I_INSTANCE DECIMAL(10) NOT NULL ,
I_OBJECTS DECIMAL(10) NOT NULL ,
NUM_VALUE DECIMAL(10) NULL ,
SHORT_TXT_VALUE VARCHAR(250) NULL
) ENGINE = InnoDB ROW_FORMAT = DYNAMIC

create table SNP_ID (
ID_SEQ DECIMAL(10) NOT NULL ,
ID_TBL VARCHAR(30) NOT NULL ,
ID_NEXT DECIMAL(19) NULL
) ENGINE = InnoDB ROW_FORMAT = DYNAMIC

create table SNP_IMPORT_REP (
REP_SHORT_ID DECIMAL(10) NOT NULL ,
REP_TIMESTAMP VARCHAR(30) NOT NULL
) ENGINE = InnoDB ROW_FORMAT = DYNAMIC

create table SNP_LOAD_PLAN (
I_LOAD_PLAN DECIMAL(19) NOT NULL ,
LOAD_PLAN_NAME VARCHAR(400) NOT NULL ,
I_SCEN_FOLDER DECIMAL(10) NULL ,
KEEP_LOG_HDAYS DECIMAL(10) NULL ,
IND_SESS_LOG VARCHAR(2) NULL ,
IND_STEP_LOG VARCHAR(2) NULL ,
TASK_LOG_LEVEL DECIMAL(1) NULL ,
SESS_KEYWORDS VARCHAR(250) NULL ,
I_TXT_DESC DECIMAL(19) NULL ,
INT_VERSION DECIMAL(10) NULL ,
IND_CHANGE VARCHAR(1) NULL ,
FIRST_DATE DATETIME NULL ,
FIRST_USER VARCHAR(400) NULL ,
LAST_DATE DATETIME NULL ,
LAST_USER VARCHAR(400) NULL ,
EXT_VERSION VARCHAR(35) NULL
) ENGINE = InnoDB ROW_FORMAT = DYNAMIC

create table SNP_LOCK (
LOCK_ID VARCHAR(35) NOT NULL ,
LOCK_NAME VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL
) ENGINE = InnoDB ROW_FORMAT = DYNAMIC

create table SNP_LOCKED_OBJECT (
I_INSTANCE DECIMAL(10) NOT NULL ,

) ENGINE = InnoDB ROW_FORMAT = DYNAMIC

create table SNP_LOC_REPW (

FIRST_DATE DATETIME NULL ,
FIRST_USER VARCHAR(400) NULL ,
LAST_DATE DATETIME NULL ,
LAST_USER VARCHAR(400) NULL
) ENGINE = InnoDB ROW_FORMAT = DYNAMIC

create table SNP_LPI_EC_VAR_LOG (

I_LP_STEP_EXCEPT DECIMAL(19) NOT NULL ,

) ENGINE = InnoDB ROW_FORMAT = DYNAMIC

DEF_IND_COMMIT VARCHAR(1) NULL ,
DEF_ISOL_LEVEL VARCHAR(3) NULL ,
DEF_PLAN_COMP VARCHAR(1) NULL ,
COL_CONTEXT_CODE VARCHAR(35) NULL ,
COL_LSCHEMA_NAME VARCHAR(35) NULL ,
COL_CON_NAME VARCHAR(35) NULL ,
COL_CONNECT_ID VARCHAR(1) NULL ,
COL_ISOL_LEVEL VARCHAR(3) NULL ,
COL_IND_COMMIT VARCHAR(1) NULL ,
COL_PLAN_COMP VARCHAR(1) NULL ,
ORD_TRT DECIMAL(10) NULL ,
IND_ERR VARCHAR(1) NULL ,
LOG_LEV_DET VARCHAR(1) NULL ,
IND_LOG_NB VARCHAR(1) NULL ,
DEF_TECH_INT_NAME VARCHAR(35) NULL ,
COL_TECH_INT_NAME VARCHAR(35) NULL ,
IND_LOG_METHOD VARCHAR(1) NULL ,
FIRST_DATE DATETIME NULL ,
LAST_DATE DATETIME NULL ,
LAST_USER VARCHAR(400) NULL ,
FIRST_USER VARCHAR(400) NULL ,
COL_TXT LONGTEXT NULL ,
COL_IND_ENC VARCHAR(1) NULL ,
COL_ENC_KEY VARCHAR(250) NULL ,
DEF_TXT LONGTEXT NULL ,
DEF_IND_ENC VARCHAR(1) NULL ,
DEF_ENC_KEY VARCHAR(250) NULL ,
ERROR_MESSAGE LONGTEXT NULL ,
IND_LOG_FINAL_CMD VARCHAR(1) NULL
) ENGINE = InnoDB ROW_FORMAT = DYNAMIC

create table SNP_SESS_TASK_LOG (
SESS_NO DECIMAL(19) NOT NULL ,
NNO DECIMAL(10) NOT NULL ,
NB_RUN DECIMAL(10) NOT NULL ,
SCEN_TASK_NO DECIMAL(10) NOT NULL ,
TASK_BEG DATETIME NULL ,
TASK_END DATETIME NULL ,

TASK_STATUS VARCHAR(1) NOT NULL ,
TASK_RC VARCHAR(35) NULL ,
TASK_MESS VARCHAR(250) NULL ,

NB_INS DECIMAL(10) NULL ,
NB_UPD DECIMAL(10) NULL ,
NB_DEL DECIMAL(10) NULL ,
NB_ERR DECIMAL(10) NULL ,
I_TXT_TASK_MESS DECIMAL(19) NULL ,
COL_TXT LONGTEXT NULL ,

COL_ENC_KEY VARCHAR(250) NULL ,
DEF_TXT LONGTEXT NULL ,
DEF_IND_ENC VARCHAR(1) NULL ,
DEF_ENC_KEY VARCHAR(250) NULL ,
TASK_NAME3 VARCHAR(436) NULL ,
IND_VALUE_TRACK VARCHAR(1) NULL ,

) ENGINE = InnoDB ROW_FORMAT = DYNAMIC

create table SNP_STEP_LOG (

NB_DEL DECIMAL(10) NULL ,

SCEN_RUN_NO DECIMAL(19) NOT NULL ,
NNO DECIMAL(10) NOT NULL ,

STEP_END DATETIME NULL ,

NB_UPD DECIMAL(10) NULL ,

) ENGINE = InnoDB ROW_FORMAT = DYNAMIC

alter table SNP_SESS_TASK_LOG add constraint FK_SESS_TASK_LOG foreign key ( NNO , SESS_NO , NB_RUN ) references SNP_STEP_LOG ( NNO , SESS_NO , NB_RUN )
alter table SNP_SESS_TASK_LS add constraint FK_SESS_TASK_LS foreign key ( SESS_NO , NNO , NB_RUN , SCEN_TASK_NO ) references SNP_SESS_TASK_LOG ( SESS_NO , NNO , NB_RUN , SCEN_TASK_NO )
alter table SNP_SESS_TXT_LOG add constraint FK_SESS_TXT_LOG foreign key ( SESS_NO , NNO , NB_RUN , SCEN_TASK_NO ) references SNP_SESS_TASK_LOG ( SESS_NO , NNO , NB_RUN , SCEN_TASK_NO )
alter table SNP_VAR_PLAN_AGENT add constraint FK_SNP_PLAN_AGENT foreign key ( I_PLAN_AGENT ) references SNP_PLAN_AGENT ( I_PLAN_AGENT )
alter table SNP_STEP_LOG add constraint FK_STEP_LOG foreign key ( SESS_NO , NNO ) references SNP_SESS_STEP ( SESS_NO , NNO )
alter table SNP_STEP_REPORT add constraint FK_STEP_REPORT foreign key ( SCEN_NO , SCEN_RUN_NO ) references SNP_SCEN_REPORT ( SCEN_NO , SCEN_RUN_NO )
alter table SNP_TASK_TXT add constraint FK_TASK_TXT foreign key ( SESS_NO , NNO , SCEN_TASK_NO ) references SNP_SESS_TASK ( SESS_NO , NNO , SCEN_TASK_NO )
alter table SNP_VAR_SCEN add constraint FK_VAR_SCEN foreign key ( SCEN_NO ) references SNP_SCEN ( SCEN_NO )
alter table SNP_VAR_SESS add constraint FK_VAR_SESS foreign key ( SESS_NO ) references SNP_SESSION ( SESS_NO )
